channel.title: Comments on: E46 M3 Photo Dump

item.title: By: Eric
item.dc:creator: Eric
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://grandmighty.github.io/grandmighty/2015/10/e46-m3-photo-dump/#comment-114005">Danny</a>.
It shifts faster and rev matches, the latter was worth it in my opinion.
The Grom unit does allow for audio streaming, which is exactly what I used it for.
And thanks... don't have any more cars to sell any more, though :)
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Danny.

It shifts faster and rev matches, the latter was worth it in my opinion.

The Grom unit does allow for audio streaming, which is exactly what I used it for.

And thanks… don’t have any more cars to sell any more, though :)

item.title: By: Danny
item.dc:creator: Danny
item.description:
How does it perform with the flash ? Curious to see if it was worth it.
The Bluetooth grim allows audio streaming for music as well?
Remind me to purchase any cars you sell. You put such perfection back into the car.
item.content:encoded:
How does it perform with the flash ? Curious to see if it was worth it.

The Bluetooth grim allows audio streaming for music as well?

Remind me to purchase any cars you sell. You put such perfection back into the car.
